issue.title: mud_box, mud_atlas models not automatically loaded in 2.6

content.raw:
I asked a related question here: http://answers.gazebosim.org/question/2867/gazebo-18-drcsim-26-doesnt-see-new-drc-world/ 

I'm also not able to get the cinder_blocks  as of 5/18 at 12:30pm. I think there's issues with other models as well, not just the mud_box... 

Edit: On a new, clean machine I am able to download cinder_blocks and other models fine.
content.html:
I asked a related question here: http://answers.gazebosim.org/question/2867/gazebo-18-drcsim-26-doesnt-see-new-drc-world/

I'm also not able to get the cinder_blocks as of 5/18 at 12:30pm. I think there's issues with other models as well, not just the mud_box...

Edit: On a new, clean machine I am able to download cinder_blocks and other models fine.
